attributes.action: Sign up to the OLPC( One Laptop Per Child scheme) for UK school children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this government does not want our children to fall behind in global computer literacy stakes then every UK child should be provided with a laptop from the OPLC project.  Uruguay has signed up for this which would mean a third world county will have provided better educational tools for their children than the UK.
